description.english: Disable NSFW content
Complete the Prologue
Spank a girl
Find out Olivia's secret
Being a prisoner on the ship, ask Bill all the questions
description.russian: Спросите у Билла все вопросы, будучи пленником на корабле

description.english: Beat Anna in shooting without misses
description.russian: Победите Анну в стрельбе без промахов

description.english: Guess the cards in the game with Olivia
description.russian: Угадайте карты в игре с Оливией

description.english: Learn how to sail the ship by proving it to Lauren
description.russian: Научитесь управлять кораблём,  доказав это Лорен

description.english: Correctly answer all the tavern keeper questions without reading the code
description.russian: Правильно ответьте на все вопросы хозяина таверны, не читая кодекс

description.english: Finish the first chapter with a good relationship with all your crew
description.russian: Закончите первую главу с хорошими отношениями со всеми членами команды

description.english: Choose chat with Nadia instead of brothel services
description.russian: Выберите общение с Нади вместо услуг борделя

description.english: Meet Tovenaar
Get to know Anna better
Kiss Olivia
Don't tell the crew that you're not alone on the island
description.russian: Не рассказывайте команде о том, что на острове вы не одни

description.english: Bring Bill a bag of guano

displayName.english: Little Pigeons Can Carry Great Messages!

description.english: Find out a little secret
Spend the evening with Aquanite
Follow the Elf
Win for the first time in the "Tailwind"
Make the right choice in the game with Anna
description.russian: Сделайте верный выбор в игре с Анной

description.english: Draw Miss Brown
Meet a cave dweller
Finish the maze in any way
See Benno's beauty

displayName.english: Honesty is the Mark of a Man

description.english: Don't lie once during your time on the island
description.russian: Ни разу не соврите за время, проведённое на острове

description.english: Choosing the same girl during the last night out, who to sleep with on the beach and in dialog with Philipp
description.russian: Выберите одну и ту же девушку во время последнего вечера, с кем спать на пляже и в разговоре с Филиппом

description.english: Learn from Tovenaar about the history of the world
description.russian: Узнать от Товенаара об истории мира

description.english: Let Lauren please you
Take advantage of the moment
Find out who poisoned Brand
Stay within a hair's breadth of death
Convince Sorna to spare you
Get a reward for the stuff
Get the maximum amount of money from the merchant
Find Benno and comfort the girl
Save Dolores from death
Defeat Anna in fencing
Touch Dolores' breasts
Complete Benno's quest
Spend the night with Benno
Take over the town for Cathal
Get a thank you from Cathal and Lauren
description.russian: Получите благодарность от Катал и Лорен

description.english: Complete Olivia's quest
Get a thank you from Olivia
Get to know the other side of the elf girl
Calm Anna
Make a deal with the basement dweller
Help Leephi escape punishment and get a commendation
description.russian: Помогите Лифи избежать наказания и получите благодарность

description.english: Give the elf girl an item from the caves
Give the hat to whoever is chosen as the romantic interest on the island
description.russian: Отдайте шляпу той, кого выбрали романтическим интересом на острове

description.english: Go to the depths with the Sea Maiden
description.russian: Отправляйтесь в глубины с Морской Девой

description.english: Find out who the brothel's secret visitor is and get more than gold
description.russian: Узнайте кто является тайным  посетителем борделя и получите нечто большее, чем "золото"

description.english: Get a “gift” for the rest of your life
description.russian: Получите украшение на всю оставшуюся жизнь

description.english: Give in to the singing of the seashells
Bring the tree back to its former beauty
Help Ka take a step forward
Get the leviathan bone and return from the rift
description.russian: Заполучите кость  левиафана и вернитесь из разлома

description.english: Find out what became of the Drowned Captain
description.russian: Узнайте что стало с Утонувшим Капитаном

description.english: Collect 69 shells in the shell fields
description.russian: Соберите 69 ракушек на полях с ракушками

description.english: Receive an amulet from Sarifa as a thank you for your good deed
description.russian: Получите амулет от Сарифы в благодарность за доброе дело

description.english: Save Ka
Help Wytta
Help Hissara
Give in to the melody and feel it
Learn the story of Hassir
Spend time with Nammu
Leave the Podwodje
Say goodbye to all the inhabitants of Podwodje
Spend time with Dolores, just like in the good old days
description.russian: Проведите время с Долорес как в старые добрые

description.english: Find common ground with Sorna, by knowing her parents, successfully planning the attack and spending time in her bed
description.russian: Найдите общий язык с Сорной, зная её родителей, удачно спланировав нападение и проведя время в её постели

description.english: Kill Sorna
Allow Vetra to take care of you after the battle
description.russian: Позвольте Ветре позаботиться о вас после сражения

description.english: Spy on Benno's games in the dark place above the galley
description.russian: Подглядите за играми Бенно в чулане над кухней

description.english: While recounting the tale of Podwodje, speak nothing but the truth
description.russian: Во время рассказа о Подводье, говорите только правду

description.english: Give gifts from Podwodje to every crew member (including Sarah and Dolores)
description.russian: Подарите подарки из Подводья каждому члену команды (даже Саре и Долорес)

description.english: Become even closer with Tovenaar than ever before
description.russian: Станьте с Товенааром ещё ближе чем когда-либо
